description: This is a market on if the Coinbase iOS app will reach #1 in the United States iPhone Apple App Store in the Finance category, under "Free Apps". It does not matter how long the app remains #1, if it does for any period of time, this market will resolve to “Yes.” If it does not reach #1 at any point before December 31st, 11:59pm EST 2020, this market will resolve to “No.” This market begins on November 25th, 2020 and will not consider anything prior. To find the Finance chart, click "Apps" at the bottom of the iOS App Store app, scroll down to "Top Free Apps" and click "See All", then tap "All Apps" in the top right corner and click "Finance", then under "Free Apps" in the "Top Charts" section, you'll see the list pertinent to this market. The Coinbase iOS app can be found here: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/coinbase-buy-sell-bitcoin/id886427730 . In the case of any ambiguity in terms of the market resolution, it will be resolved in good faith by the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: Will Coinbase reach #1 in the Finance category on the US iOS App Store before 2021?

question: Will Coinbase reach #1 in the Finance category on the US iOS App Store before 2021?
